A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The poorest of all...the worst of all...no wait...there's Episode 1!!! Man..this movie rivals with the worst Star Wars film ever. Sadly\, it kills the hype for Episode 9 and the spin-offs. The faith was fragile after the terrible Eps 1-3; Ep 7 gave us a light of hope; Rogue One elevated us to a new dawn of Star Wars...and the fall hits harder when you're far up. Ep 8 fails in almost everything; lacks of a good story\, performances and passion. It has abundant void characters (hey Phasma...2 in a row!) DJ\, Admiral Holdo\, even Luke! Sad\, sad\, sad story. Star Wars is almost dead...all my doubts to an Ep 9. I won't be going to the movies for the opening...I give you my word.
